new_case.title: Namera case
new_case.desc: case of pick poketing in a violent manner

new_case.title: John Smith case
new_case.desc: case of murder in the first degree

all_cases.title: Majnu case
all_cases.desc: Murder of a woman in Majnu Ka Tila, Delhi

all_cases.title: Delhi Hit-and-Run Case
all_cases.desc: A pedestrian was killed by a hit-and-run driver in Delhi. The driver has not yet been identified.

all_cases.title: Mumbai Bank Robbery Case
all_cases.desc: Four men robbed a bank in Mumbai and made off with over â‚¹1 crore. The suspects were later arrested and the stolen money was recovered.

all_cases.title: Bengaluru Tech Layoff Case
all_cases.desc: A tech company in Bengaluru laid off over 100 employees without notice. The employees are suing the company for wrongful termination.

all_cases.title: Noida Pollution Case
all_cases.desc: A group of residents in Noida are suing a local factory for polluting the air and water.

all_cases.title: Supreme Court Marriage Case
all_cases.desc: The Supreme Court of India ruled that same-sex marriage is legal in India.

laws.name: Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita Bill, 2023
laws.description: Overhauls the Indian Penal Code, 1860, with a focus on stricter punishments for serious crimes and faster justice delivery.

laws.name: Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita Bill, 2023
laws.description: Replaces the Criminal Procedure Code, 1898, and introduces new provisions to protect the rights of victims and witnesses.

laws.name: Bharatiya Sakshya Bill, 2023
laws.description: Replaces the Indian Evidence Act, 1872, and makes it easier to admit evidence in court.

laws.name: Anusandhan National Research Foundation Bill, 2023
laws.description: Establishes a new national research foundation to support fundamental research in science and technology.

laws.name: Offshore Areas Mineral (Development and Regulation) Amendment Bill, 2023
laws.description: Streamlines the process for awarding licenses to explore and mine minerals in offshore areas.

laws.name: Registration of Births and Deaths (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Creates a national database of registered births and deaths.

laws.name: Jammu and Kashmir Reservation (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Increases the reservation for Scheduled Tribes in Jammu and Kashmir from 7.5% to 15%.

laws.name: Constitution (Scheduled Castes) Order (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Includes the Dalit community of Notified, Nomadic and Semi-Nomadic Tribes (DNTs) in the list of Scheduled Castes.

laws.name: National Nursing and Midwifery Commission Bill, 2023
laws.description: Establishes a separate regulatory body for nurses and midwives.

laws.name: National Dental Commission Bill, 2023
laws.description: Establishes a separate regulatory body for dentists.

laws.name: Cinematograph (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Empowers the central government to regulate the exhibition of films online.

laws.name: Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Gives the central government more power over the administration of Delhi.

laws.name: Indian Institutes of Management (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Grants autonomy to the Indian Institutes of Management.

laws.name: Pharmacy (Amendment) Bill, 2023
laws.description: Makes it mandatory for all pharmacists to register with a state pharmacy council.

laws.name: Digital Personal Data Protection Bill, 2023
laws.description: Protects the privacy of individuals' personal data.
